text: Out Of Here is an album by Tim Keegan and Departure Lounge, released on Keegan's Meek Giant label in 2000. ==Track listing== *"Music For Pleasure" *"The New You" *"Slow News Day" *"Disconnected" *"Win Them Back" *"Save Me From Happiness" *"Postcard From A Friend" *"Johnny A" *"Stay On The Line" *"We've Got Everything We Need" *"1911999" ==External links== * Pitchfork review of the album Out Of Here Category:2000 debut albums
title: Out of Here (Departure Lounge album)
